de.orolle.bigsense.server.util

Class DecodeAndroidManifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.orolle.bigsense.server.util.DecodeAndroidManifest

  • public class DecodeAndroidManifest
extends java.lang.Object
    Decodes an binary AndroidManifest in an APK file copied from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2097813/how-to-parse-the-androidmanifest-xml-file-inside-an-apk-package
    Author:
    Oliver Rolle

        Parameters:
        xml - Binary-formatted XML
        sitOff - the sit off

        strInd - the str ind
        Returns:

      • compXmlStringAt

        public static java.lang.String compXmlStringAt(byte[] arr,
                               int strOff)
        Tool method for decompressXML() Return the string stored in StringTable format at offset strOff. This offset points to the 16 bit string length, which is followed by that number of 16 bit (Unicode) chars.
        Parameters:
        arr - StringTable array
        strOff - Offset to get string from
        Returns:
        String from StringTable at offset strOff

      • LEW

        public static int LEW(byte[] arr,
      int off)
        Return value of a Little Endian 32 bit word from the byte array at offset off.
        Parameters:
        arr - Byte array with 32 bit word
        off - Offset to get word from
        Returns:
        Value of Little Endian 32 bit word specified
